'''Fisherman's Preservation Trick''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Fisherman's Preservation Trick can be obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest beaneath a [[Dendro Pile]] in [[Apam Woods]], [[Ashavan Realm]].
